definition[0]: a passage which goes down through a building or down into the ground, so that someone or something can get in or out
definition[1]: a long handle on a tool, spear etc
definition[3]: a long thin piece of metal in an engine or machine, that turns and passes on power or movement to another part of the machine
definition[4]: one of a pair of poles between which a horse is tied to pull a vehicle
definition[6]: to treat someone very unfairly, especially by dishonestly getting money from them
